[00:00.00]Hey Look Ma, I Made It - Panic! At The Disco
[00:09.79]Lyricist：Michael Angelakos/Sam Hollander/Dillon Francis/Jake Sinclair/Brendon Urie/Morgan Kibby
[00:19.59]All my life been hustlin'
[00:21.56]And tonight is my appraisal
[00:24.04]'Cause I'm a hooker sellin' songs
[00:26.01]And my pimp's a record label
[00:28.39]This world is full of demons
[00:30.32]Stocks and bonds and bible traders
[00:32.81]So I do the deed
[00:34.04]Get up and leave
[00:35.26]A climber and a sadist yeah
[00:37.95]Are you ready for the sequel
[00:39.35]
[00:40.14]Ain't ready for the latest
[00:41.85]
